question: Are the games really free to play?
answer: Yes! All games are completely free to play, with no ads or creepy trackers.

question: Do I need an account to play?
answer: Nope. No accounts, logins, or personal data required. Just visit the site and start playing.

question: Why no ads, don't you want to make money?
answer: Ads can be super annoying and creepy, so we ditched them for a donation model instead. We use basic analytics to make sure everything runs smoothly, but we never sell or share your data.

question: How do you keep the site running?
answer: We rely entirely on donations and sponsorships to fund our studio. Every contribution helps us create more games and keep the site ad-free and tracking-free.

question: Can I get a refund for my donation?
answer: Donations are non-refundable, as they directly support our ongoing development and operational costs. We deeply appreciate your generosity!

question: What are the benefits of sponsoring MYOL MiniGames?
answer: Right now, we don't have specific sponsor benefits, but we're super grateful for your support! It helps us keep making new games and maintaining our site ad-free, tracking-free. We're actually working on some cool membership tiers and perks, so stay tuned for updates!

question: Can I suggest a game idea?
answer: Absolutely! We love hearing from our community. Use the [contact form](https://wheat-fragrance-67b.notion.site/1a159febf5ad80f7ae72f153de397deb?pvs=105) to share your ideas.

question: How do I contact you?
answer: Reach us via email at [contact@myol-creative.com](mailto:contact@myol-creative.com) or use the [contact form](https://wheat-fragrance-67b.notion.site/1a159febf5ad80f7ae72f153de397deb?pvs=105). We'll do our best to reply within 2-3 business days.
